Key Match Events: Ryan Mendes scored from a defensive error
Kevin Pina struck a fierce shot into the top corner
Miscellaneous Highlights: Former Manchester United winger Bebe scored
Others: Cape Verde won 3-0 in Abidjna to go top of their group
Senegal beat Cameroon 3-1 to earn qualification
Guinea defeated Gambia in the other Group C match
Cape Verde are the first team to qualify for the knockout round
Guinea scored on 69 minutes through Aguibou Camara
The win and three points moves them into second spot in the table
Gambia remain pointless having lost both their matches so far
